price: Baravuga bati “Nimumutwike (Ibrahimu) maze murengere imana zanyu, niba mushobora kugira icyo mukora.”
arabic: قَالُواْ حَرِّقُوهُ وَٱنصُرُوٓاْ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālū ḥarriqūhu wa-unṣurū ālihatakum in kuntum fāʿilīna
